# improvmx Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    improvmx = {
      source  = "christippett/improvmx"
      version = "0.0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "improvmx" {
  api_key = "<API_KEY>"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **api_key** (String, Sensitive) API key used to access ImprovMX's API. Refer to the [ImprovMX API documentation](https://improvmx.com/api/) for instructions on obtaining an API token.

### Optional

- **base_url** (String) The base URL used to access ImprovMXâ€™s API.
